fontFamily.title: Font Family
fontFamily.description:
The font family used to render markdown.
If `null`, value from current theme is used.

fontSize.title: Font Size
fontSize.description:
The size in pixel of the font used to render markdown.
If `null`, value from current theme is used.

lineHeight.title: Line Height
lineHeight.description:
The line height used to render markdown.
If `null`, value from current theme is used.

lineWidth.title: Line Width
lineWidth.description:
The text line width expressed in CSS ch units.
If `null`, lines fit the viewport width.

hideFrontMatter.title: Hide Front Matter
hideFrontMatter.description:
Whether to hide YAML front matter.
The YAML front matter must be placed at the top of the document,
started by a line of three dashes (---) and ended by a line of
three dashes (---) or three points (...).
